chat_history.message: The sum of 1 + 2 is 3. If you have any more math questions or if there's anything else I can help you with, feel free to ask!
Certainly! If you multiply 3 by 2, the result is 6. If you have any more questions or if there's anything else I can help you with, feel free to ask!

message: Why can't you divide by zero?
